segments.text: How can that woman possibly not notice the sink is overflowing?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is soaking wet, for goodness sake!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right there, meticulously polishing a plate, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're climbing on that wobbly stool, reaching for cookies, clearly unsupervised.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just a recipe for disaster and it's so easily fixable!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn off that faucet immediately!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And get those children down before one of them breaks a bone or the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The lack of awareness here is frankly infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of negligence just boils my blood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water steadily spreading across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR
